translations: 纠缠（implicate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Senior officials were implicated in the scandal.
sentences.translation: 一些高级官员受到这一丑闻的牵连。

sentences.sentence: The president was implicated in the cover-up and forced to resign.
sentences.translation: 该总统与此次隐瞒真相的事件有牵连，被迫辞职。

sentences.sentence: He was obliged to resign when one of his own aides was implicated in a financial scandal.
sentences.translation: 他因一名助手涉入一起金融丑闻案而被迫辞职。
